items.sentence: Tom and Mary went on a safari and saw many animals, such as lions, giraffes, zebras, and hippopotamuses.
Tom is the type of person who always demands that something be done rather than request that it be done.
I\'ll be playing tennis with Tom this afternoon, but it\'s not something I\'m really looking forward to.
Tom had no idea, as he set off for the party, that he was going to meet the love of his life that night.
If we both hadn't broken our legs at the same time, we wouldn't have gotten to spend this time together.
